solution_line_template: Counting the remaining {remaining_apples} apples. There were {initial_apples} - {remaining_apples} = <<{initial_apples}-{remaining_apples}={apples_sold}>>{apples_sold} apples sold.
Counting the remaining {remaining_oranges} oranges. There were {initial_oranges} - {remaining_oranges} = <<{initial_oranges}-{remaining_oranges}={oranges_sold}>>{oranges_sold} oranges sold.
The amount of sales for the apples is ${cost_per_apple} x {apples_sold} = $<<{cost_per_apple}*{apples_sold}={apple_sales}>>{apple_sales}.
The amount of sales for the oranges is ${cost_per_orange} x {oranges_sold} = $<<{cost_per_orange}*{oranges_sold}={orange_sales}>>{orange_sales}.
